honeywell.printer.configuration.dpl

Class AvalancheEnabler_DPL

  • java.lang.Object
    • honeywell.printer.configuration.dpl.PrinterData_DPL
      • honeywell.printer.configuration.dpl.PrinterState_DPL
        • honeywell.printer.configuration.dpl.AvalancheEnabler_DPL
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AvalancheEnabler_DPL
extends PrinterState_DPL
    This class handles the Avalanche Enabler Settings data from the [STX]KcQQQ query as well as accessors to read the data values.

    This class supports the following possible parameters:

    ParameterDescription
    1Avalanche Enabler Active
    2Agent IP Address
    3Agent Port Number
    4Agent DNS Name
    5Connectivity Type
    6Printer Name
    7Printer Model
    8Update Mode
    9Update Interval
    10Print Status Result
    11Update Package Name
    12Remove Old Updates Prior to Update
    13Upgrade Package Version (READ-ONLY)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • AvalancheEnabler_DPL

        public AvalancheEnabler_DPL(ConnectionBase conn)
        The default constructor will initialize the class with default values.

        Initially all of the _IsValid parameters will be false because no data has been processed. To 'populate' the values, the object must invoke @see PrinterState_DPL.queryPrinter(int) with the query response string.

        Parameters:
        conn - connection to printer
